column3: Establishment of a Sentinel Laboratory-Based Antimicrobial Resistance Surveillance Network in Ethiopia
column4: Description of establishment of an AMR sentinel surveillance system in Ethiopia.
column6: 3.2 Initiate AMR surveillance at pilot or representative regional and referral hospitals.

column3: Antimicrobial Stewardship Programmes in Health-care Facilities in Low- and Middle-Income Countries: A WHO Practical Toolkit
column4: The specific aim of the toolkit is to enable antimicrobial stewardship in health-care facilities in low- and middle-income countries.
column6: 3.4 Expand antimicrobial stewardship activities to all healthcare facilities.,"3.4 Monitor and evaluate stewardship programmes conducted, including the analysis of antimicrobial use data.",3.4 Implement stewardship practices at designated healthcare facilities.
